title: Day 286 (Luke 11) - Year 4
itunes:title: Day 286 (Luke 11) - Year 4
description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! Seriously, go there. - Join our PATREON community for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Article 1 of 2: Does It Matter Which Person of the Trinity We Pray To?

- Article 2 of 2: You Asked: Can I Pray to Jesus?

- Book: Delighting in the Trinity* 

- Book: He’s Where the Joy Is

  *This is an affiliate link. A small percentage of your purchase helps support The Bible Recap!

- Mark 3:31-35

- Matthew 12:38-41

- Luke 7:36-50

- Credits  

SOCIALS:

TLC: Instagram | Facebook | Twitter

 

D-GROUP: The Bible Recap is brought to you by D-Group - an international network of discipleship and accountability groups that meet weekly in homes and churches: Find or start one near you today!
